thread.title: The National Association of Mortgage Field Services (NAMFS) Welcomes 45 New Members to the Association
thread.title_full: The National Association of Mortgage Field Services (NAMFS) Welcomes 45 New Members to the Association

author: Eric Miller, Executive Director
title: The National Association of Mortgage Field Services (NAMFS) Welcomes 45 New Members to the Association
text:
The National Association of Mortgage Field Services (NAMFS), the oldest and largest association for default mortgage field services providers, welcomes 45 new member companies to the association. New members are formally recommended by existing member companies and gain access to association benefits including business webinars, product discounts and industry directories. NAMFS currently has 500 member companies who select a board of directors responsible for the development of ongoing educational programs, creating business opportunities and developing industry solutions. See who's joined NAMFS and meet the newly elected board members by visiting the website .
Interested in joining NAMFS? Learn more here .
Association membership is available to individuals and companies offering services or products related to the mortgage field services providers and other businesses in the mortgage servicing industry.
About NAMFS
The National Association of Mortgage Field Services, Inc. (NAMFS) is the premier trade association for the mortgage field service industry. We are dedicated to working with all entities of the industry from the Government Agencies and investors that set policy to the contractors and inspectors that perform the work.
